```scss
// Property: moviePlayerStatus
// Description: Returns the status of the movie player.
// Component(s): Ti.Media.VideoPlayer
'.movie-player-status-video-load-state-failed': { moviePlayerStatus: Ti.Media.VIDEO_LOAD_STATE_FAILED }
'.movie-player-status-video-load-state-playable': { moviePlayerStatus: Ti.Media.VIDEO_LOAD_STATE_PLAYABLE }
'.movie-player-status-video-load-state-unknown': { moviePlayerStatus: Ti.Media.VIDEO_LOAD_STATE_UNKNOWN }
```
